00744 // The following definitions are exported purely for the convenience of the 
00745 // install tool ("BetterAuthorizationSampleLibInstallTool.c").  You must not 
00746 // use them in your own code.
00747 
00748 #if !defined(BAS_PRIVATE)
00749     #define BAS_PRIVATE 0
00750 #endif
00751 #if BAS_PRIVATE
00752 
00753         // Hard-wired file system paths for the launchd property list file and 
00754         // the privileged helper tool.  In all cases, %s is a placeholder 
00755         // for the bundle ID (in file system representation).
00756         
00757     #define kBASPlistPathFormat             "/Library/LaunchDaemons/%s.plist"
00758 
00759     #define kBASToolDirPath                 "/Library/PrivilegedHelperTools"                    // KEEP IN SYNC!
00760     #define kBASToolPathFormat              "/Library/PrivilegedHelperTools/%s"                 // KEEP IN SYNC!
00761         
00762         // Commands strings for the install tool.
00763 
00764     #define kBASInstallToolInstallCommand "install"
00765     #define kBASInstallToolEnableCommand  "enable"
00766 
00767         // Magic values used to bracket the process ID returned by the install tool.
00768         
00769     #define kBASAntiZombiePIDToken1 "cricket<"
00770     #define kBASAntiZombiePIDToken2 ">bat"
00771     
00772     // Magic value used to indicate success or failure from the install tool.
00773     
00774     #define kBASInstallToolSuccess "oK"
00775     #define kBASInstallToolFailure "FailUrE %d"
00776 
00777 #endif
